title: Used Car Price Predictions
short_description: Regression model and dashboard to estimate fair market price for used cars.
full_description: Built a robust modeling pipeline to predict used car prices using feature engineering, gradient boosting models, and model explainability to support pricing decisions.
problem_statement: Derive an automated estimate for fair market value to improve listing conversion and reduce price disputes.
approach: Data cleaning, EDA, feature engineering (age, mileage adjustment), model training with XGBoost, cross-validation, SHAP analysis, and a production-ready scoring notebook.
outcomes: Achieved 18% reduction in price variance vs baseline heuristic and a 12% increase in listing conversion in A/B test.

title: Customer Churn Analysis & Experimentation
short_description: Cohort analysis and causal inference to inform retention experiments.
full_description: Performed survival analysis, uplift modeling, and designed randomized experiments to reduce churn. Delivered prioritized experiment plan with expected value estimates.
problem_statement: Identify drivers of churn and test interventions to reduce monthly churn rate.
approach: EDA, survival curves, propensity score matching, uplift modeling, and A/B test design with power analysis.
outcomes: Recommended top 3 interventions with estimated 4% absolute reduction in monthly churn if rolled out.

title: Pricing Experimentation Framework
short_description: Framework to run rapid pricing experiments and measure elasticity across segments.
full_description: Designed a repeatable experimental framework, instrumentation, and analysis templates to measure price elasticity and inform pricing strategy.
problem_statement: Enable reliable measurement of price sensitivity to optimize revenue.
approach: Segment definition, randomized pricing variants, regression adjustment, and hierarchical modeling to pool information across segments.
outcomes: Framework reduced time-to-insight from 6 weeks to 2 weeks; identified high-value segments for targeted pricing.
